title: Priests & Levites Commandments Quiz - Biblical Commands About Priests & Levites
description: Test your knowledge of the 35 biblical commandments related to priests & levites. Covers 10 positive and 25 negative commandments from the Torah.

questions.question: Which commandment requires the priests to bless the Israelite nation daily?
options: The priests must bless the Israelite nation daily
A priest must wash his hands and feet before service
The Levites must work in the Temple
No Levite must do the work of another priest or Levite
questions.correctAnswer: The priests must bless the Israelite nation daily
questions.explanation: Commandment #78 requires priests to bless the Israelite nation daily as stated in Numbers 6:23.

questions.question: What is forbidden for the high priest regarding marriage according to Leviticus 21:14?
options: The high priest must not marry a widow
The high priest must marry a virgin maiden
The high priest must marry a divorced woman
The high priest must marry a widow
questions.correctAnswer: The high priest must not marry a widow
questions.explanation: Commandment #169 forbids the high priest from marrying a widow, as stated in Leviticus 21:14.

questions.question: Which positive commandment mandates that the Levites must transport the ark on their shoulders?
options: The Levites must work in the Temple
The Levites must transport the ark on their shoulders
Give the Levites cities to inhabit and their surrounding fields
Send the impure person from the Temple
questions.correctAnswer: The Levites must transport the ark on their shoulders
questions.explanation: Commandment #312 requires the Levites to transport the ark on their shoulders as found in Numbers 7:9.

questions.question: What is the commandment regarding priests entering the Temple intoxicated?
options: A priest must not enter the Temple intoxicated
A priest must enter the Temple with priestly garments
A priest must wash his hands and feet before service
A priest must not enter the Temple with torn clothes
questions.correctAnswer: A priest must not enter the Temple intoxicated
questions.explanation: Commandment #321 forbids priests from entering the Temple intoxicated as stated in Leviticus 10:9.

questions.question: According to the commandments, what kind of woman must a high priest marry?
options: A virgin maiden
A widow
A divorced woman
A woman who has had forbidden sexual relations
questions.correctAnswer: A virgin maiden
questions.explanation: Commandment #171 states the high priest must marry a virgin maiden as per Leviticus 21:13.

questions.question: Which commandment states that the Tribe of Levi must not be given a portion of the land in Israel?
options: The Tribe of Levi must not be given a portion of the land in Israel
Give the Levites cities to inhabit and their surrounding fields
The Levites must work in the Temple
The Levites must transport the ark on their shoulders
questions.correctAnswer: The Tribe of Levi must not be given a portion of the land in Israel
questions.explanation: Commandment #297 forbids the Tribe of Levi from receiving a land portion according to Deuteronomy 18:1.

questions.question: Which of the following is a positive commandment concerning priestly service?
options: Dedicate the priest for service
A priest must not enter the sanctuary of the Temple indiscriminately
An impure priest must not do service in the Temple
A priest must not enter the Temple intoxicated
questions.correctAnswer: Dedicate the priest for service
questions.explanation: Commandment #316 requires dedicating the priest for service, as commanded in Leviticus 21:8.

questions.question: What must the priests wear during their service according to Exodus 28:2?
options: Priestly garments
Simple linen clothes
No special garments
Animal skins
questions.correctAnswer: Priestly garments
questions.explanation: Commandment #318 instructs priests to wear their priestly garments during service as in Exodus 28:2.

questions.question: What is forbidden regarding the priestly garments according to Exodus 28:32?
options: Do not tear the priestly garments
Do not wear colorful garments
Do not wear garments made of wool
Do not wear priestly garments outside the Temple
questions.correctAnswer: Do not tear the priestly garments
questions.explanation: Commandment #319 forbids tearing the priestly garments as specified in Exodus 28:32.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids a priest from entering the Temple with torn clothes?
options: A priest must not enter the Temple with torn clothes
A priest must wash his hands and feet before service
The priests must wear priestly garments during service
A priest must not enter the Temple intoxicated
questions.correctAnswer: A priest must not enter the Temple with torn clothes
questions.explanation: Commandment #323 forbids priests from entering the Temple with torn clothes as stated in Leviticus 10:6.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids a priest from entering the Temple with his head uncovered?
options: A priest must not enter the Temple with his head uncovered
A priest must not enter the Temple intoxicated
A priest must wash his hands and feet before service
The priests must wear priestly garments during service
questions.correctAnswer: A priest must not enter the Temple with his head uncovered
questions.explanation: Commandment #322 prohibits a priest from entering the Temple with his head uncovered as found in Leviticus 10:6.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids impure persons from entering the Temple Mount area?
options: An impure person must not enter the Temple Mount area
Send the impure person from the Temple
An impure priest must not do service in the Temple
A priest with a physical blemish must not serve
questions.correctAnswer: An impure person must not enter the Temple Mount area
questions.explanation: Commandment #328 forbids impure persons from entering the Temple Mount area as stated in Deuteronomy 23:11.

questions.question: What must a priest do before service as commanded in Exodus 30:19?
options: Wash his hands and feet before service
Wear priestly garments
Offer a burnt offering
Fast for one day
questions.correctAnswer: Wash his hands and feet before service
questions.explanation: Commandment #331 requires a priest to wash his hands and feet before service as instructed in Exodus 30:19.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids a priest with a physical blemish from serving?
options: A priest with a physical blemish must not serve
A priest must wash his hands and feet before service
A priest must not enter the Temple intoxicated
The priests must bless the Israelite nation daily
questions.correctAnswer: A priest with a physical blemish must not serve
questions.explanation: Commandment #333 forbids priests with physical blemishes from serving as stated in Leviticus 21:17.

questions.question: Which commandment forbids the high priest from defiling himself for any relative?
options: The high priest must not defile himself for any relative
The high priest must marry a virgin maiden
The high priest must bless the Israelite nation daily
The high priest must not enter the Temple intoxicated
questions.correctAnswer: The high priest must not defile himself for any relative
questions.explanation: Commandment #588 forbids the high priest from defiling himself even for relatives as stated in Leviticus 21:11.

questions.question: What is forbidden for the Levites regarding spoils of war?
options: The Levites must not take a share in the spoils of war
The Levites must work in the Temple
The Levites must transport the ark on their shoulders
The Levites must not serve as priests
questions.correctAnswer: The Levites must not take a share in the spoils of war
questions.explanation: Commandment #298 forbids Levites from taking a share in spoils of war as noted in Deuteronomy 18:1.

questions.question: What is the status of one who is not a priest regarding service in the Temple?
options: One who is not a priest must not serve
One who is not a priest may serve with permission
One who is not a priest may serve only outside the sanctuary
One who is not a priest may serve as a Levite
questions.correctAnswer: One who is not a priest must not serve
questions.explanation: Commandment #335 forbids anyone who is not a priest from serving in the Temple as stated in Numbers 18:4.

questions.question: Which commandment commands sending impure persons away from the camp?
options: Send the impure person from the Temple
An impure person must not enter the Temple Mount area
Impure priests must not do service in the Temple
A priest must wash his hands and feet before service
questions.correctAnswer: Send the impure person from the Temple
questions.explanation: Commandment #326 requires sending impure persons away from the camp as found in Numbers 5:2.

questions.question: True or False: The Levites are allowed to take a portion of the land in Israel as inheritance.
options: True
False
questions.correctAnswer: False
questions.explanation: According to commandment #297 and Deuteronomy 18:1, Levites shall have no portion or inheritance with Israel.

questions.question: True or False: A priest with a temporary blemish is permitted to serve in the Temple.
options: True
False
questions.correctAnswer: False
questions.explanation: Commandment #334 forbids priests with temporary blemishes from serving as stated in Leviticus 21:17.

questions.question: True or False: The high priest may enter under the same roof as a corpse.
options: True
False
questions.correctAnswer: False
questions.explanation: Commandment #589 forbids the high priest from entering under the same roof as a corpse as per Leviticus 21:11.

questions.question: True or False: The priests must have equal shifts during holidays.
options: True
False
questions.correctAnswer: True
questions.explanation: Commandment #317 requires that the priests' shifts be equal during holidays as stated in Deuteronomy 18:6.

questions.question: True or False: A priest must not leave the Temple during his service.
options: True
False
questions.correctAnswer: True
questions.explanation: Commandment #325 forbids a priest from leaving the Temple during service as found in Leviticus 10:7.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: The Levites shall perform the service of the ________, and bear their iniquity.
options: tent of meeting
altar
Temple
sanctuary
questions.correctAnswer: tent of meeting
questions.explanation: Commandment #314 states the Levites shall perform the service of the tent of meeting (Numbers 18:23).

questions.question: Fill in the blank: Command the sons of Israel to give the Levites from the inheritance of their possession ________ to live in.
options: cities
fields
lands
tents
questions.correctAnswer: cities
questions.explanation: Commandment #299 instructs giving the Levites cities to inhabit from the inheritance of the sons of Israel (Numbers 35:2).
